name: Azura
miniDescription: A clean, modern landing page for a real estate management platform.
description: Azura’s landing page introduces a real estate platform with clarity and modern elegance, highlighting efficiency and usability.
The layout guides users through a smooth narrative from value proposition to pricing and testimonials.
Its minimalist design and strong visual hierarchy make it both professional and conversion ready.
highlights: Hero section with clear call to action
Feature overview and pricing sections
Client testimonials and trust indicators
Responsive, visually consistent design

name: Furnico
miniDescription: A modern, sustainability-focused furniture brand landing page.
description: Furnico’s landing page introduces its mission of blending timeless design with eco-conscious materials to furnish homes elegantly.
The layout flows through collections, brand values, testimonials, and calls to action, guiding users toward exploring and purchasing.
With clean typography, strong visuals, and responsive design, the page emphasizes both style and trust.
highlights: Hero section with headline, subtext, and dual CTAs (Shop / Explore)
Section for featured collections (e.g. Whitehaven, Pebble Lounge, Luna Lounge)
Client testimonial section enhancing trust
Newsletter signup & footer with company / resources links

name: Social
miniDescription: A stylish personal social link aggregator page.
description: This project creates a clean profile page that aggregates a person’s social media links, making them easily accessible in one place.
It features a hero area with name, location, short bio, and icons linking to GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram.
Designed for simplicity and clarity, it focuses on UI layout, responsive design, and minimal distractions.
highlights: Central profile header with name, tagline and location
Social media icons linking to multiple platforms
Clean, minimal UI with vertical link layout
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

name: Recipe Page
miniDescription: A clean and functional recipe display page.
description: This recipe page presents a classic omelette recipe with clear sections for ingredients, instructions, and nutrition.
It’s designed for readability and usability, with a focus on structured content and simple layout.
The page emphasizes clarity, accessibility, and elegance in presenting cooking information.
highlights: Ingredient list and clear measurements section
Step-by-step instructions with numbered ordering
Nutrition facts table per serving
Minimal design emphasizing readability and structure

name: Bento Grid
miniDescription: A polished UI for AI-powered social media scheduling tool.
description: Bento Grid’s landing interface highlights features like AI content generation, automated posting schedules, and multi-account management.
It presents compelling metrics (e.g. “56% faster audience growth”) and visual storytelling to encourage signups or exploration.
The design is clean and modern, with strong imagery, bold headlines, and an intuitive layout guiding user focus.
highlights: Hero section with prominent headline and subheadline
Illustrative feature blocks (AI writing, scheduling, analytics)
Statistic / trust indicator (e.g. “56% faster audience growth”)
Clean responsive layout with imagery supporting messaging

name: Four Card Feature
miniDescription: A clean, card-based feature display section.
description: This project displays a section with four feature cards highlighting different modules like Supervisor, Team Builder, Karma, and Calculator.
It uses concise headlines and descriptive text under each card to communicate distinct value propositions clearly.
The design is minimal and responsive, focusing on readability, layout symmetry, and visual hierarchy.
highlights: Four feature cards with title, icon/image, and text
Hero heading with “Reliable, efficient delivery powered by technology”
Responsive layout adapting to mobile and desktop
Consistent typography, spacing, and visual alignment

name: Flylo
miniDescription: Secure file storage and collaboration landing page.
description: The landing page introduces Fylo with a clear headline touting secure, cloud-based file access from anywhere.
It walks users through core benefits accessibility, security, collaboration, and file type support in a clean, structured layout.
The design emphasizes trust and conversion, using testimonials, CTAs, and concise content to guide visitors.
highlights: Hero section with headline, subtext, and primary CTA (“Get Started”)
Core benefits section: Access Anywhere, Security, Collaboration, File Support
Customer testimonials with images and quotes
Newsletter / early access signup with convincing prompt

name: AudioPhile
miniDescription: A premium e-commerce experience for high-end audio products.
description: AudioPhile is a fully functional e-commerce platform designed for audio enthusiasts, featuring a clean modern UI and a seamless shopping flow.
It includes category-based product listings, detailed product pages, cart and checkout functionalities, and dynamic routing for a smooth user experience.
The design emphasizes luxury and usability, creating a professional retail feel across all devices with responsive layouts and polished animations.
features: Dynamic product catalog with filtering and category navigation
Product detail pages with image galleries, descriptions, and specs
Add-to-cart and quantity management system
Persistent shopping cart with live updates
Checkout flow with customer details, payment summary, and confirmation
Responsive and accessible design optimized for mobile and desktop
Reusable component-based structure for scalability
Integrated local storage or API-based data handling for cart persistence
Interactive UI elements and smooth page transitions

name: Space Tourism
miniDescription: An immersive multi-page space tourism experience website.
description: This full website guides users through destinations, crew, and technology in an immersive space travel narrative.
Each section (Home, Destination, Crew, Technology) is rich with visual storytelling, interactive elements, and content depth.
The design balances aesthetics and usability with animations, responsive layout, and intuitive navigation.
features: Multi-page site: Home, Destination, Crew, Technology
Dynamic content per destination (images, descriptions, distance, travel time)
Interactive crew profiles and technology details
Responsive navigation bar with active link highlighting
Smooth transitions and animated content per section

name: Zentrip
miniDescription: A full-stack travel exploration and booking platform.
description: Zentrip allows users to discover destinations, plan custom trips, and book adventures with ease.
The site showcases featured destinations, a trip-planning form, photo gallery, testimonials, and subscription section.
Its design emphasizes inspiration, trust, and usability through coherent layout, image storytelling, and clear CTAs.
features: Search/trip planner form (location, date, guests)
Featured destinations section with pricing
Photo gallery of traveler images
Testimonials section with user quotes and images
Newsletter subscription / footer links section
Responsive design across devices
Smooth navigation between page sections

name: Silque
miniDescription: A fully functional e-commerce storefront with polished UI and checkout flow.
description: Silque is a complete online store that showcases product collections, detailed product pages, and a streamlined shopping experience from browsing to checkout.
The site includes core e-commerce flows—product listing and filtering, cart management, secure checkout, and order confirmation designed with conversion and UX in mind.
Polished visual design, responsive layouts, and purchase-focused CTAs create a credible retail experience across desktop and mobile.
features: Product catalog with categories and collection pages
Product detail pages with images, descriptions, options (variants) and pricing
Search and filtering (by category, price, or attributes)
Persistent shopping cart with add/remove and quantity controls
Guest and authenticated checkout flow (shipping, billing, order summary)
Payment integration (card checkout / third-party payment provider)
Order confirmation and basic order history UI
Responsive layout and mobile-friendly interactions
Basic inventory/stock handling and price display
SEO-friendly product metadata and structured content

name: Prime Haven
miniDescription: A polished landing page for Prime Haven property platform.
description: Prime Haven’s landing page introduces its property services with clarity and refined aesthetics, highlighting trust and premium offerings.
The layout flows through core sections like Featured Listings, Services, Testimonials, and Call to Action prompts to drive engagement.
With responsive design, strong visual hierarchy, and compelling imagery, the page is crafted to convert visitors into leads.
highlights: Hero banner with headline, subtext, and primary call-to-action
Featured properties or listings section
Services or mechanism section explaining platform value
Trust/testimonial section and contact/CTA footer

name: Portfolio
miniDescription: Personal portfolio showcasing projects, skills and UI/UX work.
description: This portfolio site presents your full stack of work, combining your best full websites, landing pages, and side projects in one clean interface.
It features project overviews, live demos, GitHub links, and visual highlights, allowing visitors to explore your design and coding capability seamlessly.
With responsive layout, modern styling, and strong focus on visual clarity and interactivity, it serves both as a showcase and as a personal brand hub.
features: Project gallery with live version previews and links
Detailed project entries including description, features / highlights, tech stack
Responsive design ensuring good experience on mobile and desktop
Easy navigation between home, contact, and project sections
Strong visual identity and consistent design system
